arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach left counting cost of decisive moments as Stoke City undone by Burnley
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach was left mulling over missed opportunities for Stoke City to snatch an all-important first-half goal before they were undone by promotion-chasing Burnley in the second. Pelach was pleased with Stoke’s first-half performance after changing formation and to a more pragmatic, direct style against a team that has only let in six goals in 18 games.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker delighted to come through gruelling three-game week with maximum points
arts.sum: Burnley FC boss Scott Parker said he was delighted with how his team had come through a testing three-game week.

arts.ttl: Stoke City 0, Burnley 2: Clarets up to second after convincing away win
arts.sum: Few would have bet against a Clarets clean sheet at the bet365 Stadium – but backing them for a second straight 2-0 win might have been a longer shot.

arts.ttl: Stoke City player ratings vs Burnley as big task looms for Narcis Pelach
arts.sum: The breakthrough came early in the second half when Jay Rodriguez tapped home a Josh Laurent knock across the six-yard box and Josh Brownhill made the points sure with a penalty after Tatsuki Seko had fouled Josh Cullen. Decent chances always seemed like they would be few and far between in a clash between two teams who haven’t made a habit of conceding from open play and so it proved – but Stoke had the bit between their teeth through a tactical first half.

arts.ttl: Burnley go second with Stoke win as in-form Clarets record another clean sheet
arts.sum: Jay Rodriguez and Josh Brownhill scored second-half goals for Scott Parker’s men.

arts.ttl: 25 images of Burnley fans arriving at the bet365 Stadium for the Championship fixture against Stoke City
arts.sum: Burnley fans have arrived at the bet365 Stadium for the Championship fixture against Stoke City.

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Burnley live news, action and reaction from bet365 Stadium
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach admits he was warned about the job he was taking on at Stoke City but, two-and-a-half months in, he’s pointing to a list of reasons why he’s still excited and enthusiastic to be the club’s head coach. 'People warned me Stoke City was a hard place to be a coach but they were wrong'

arts.ttl: Narcis Pelach tackles alarming number of shots Stoke City concede with must-read tactics tutorial
arts.sum: Narcis Pelach has spelled out why he is prepared to concede more shots than might normally be expected – but still make sure Viktor Johansson has a chance to be the hero – as he changes Stoke City’s defensive style. Pelach has moved Stoke’s focus to defending space since he took over from Steven Schumacher in September but the number of shots they have let the opposition take, as well as man of the match awards for keeper Johansson, has been highlighted while they have gone on a run of one defeat in 10.

arts.ttl: Stoke vs Burnley predictions: Clarets can keep it clean in Potteries
arts.sum: Burnley comfortably boast the best defensive record in the Championship and Simon Barlow believes they can demonstrate that strength once again when they travel to Stoke on Saturday

arts.ttl: Burnley manager Scott Parker answers questions on January transfer window
arts.sum: Burnley manager Scott Parker would not be drawn over any possible incomings or outgoings when the Janaury transfer window opens in the new year.
